about.title: Our Story
about.paragraph1: Our story is a journeyâ€”one that begins high in the Himalayas, near the foot of Sagarmatha (Mount Everest), and winds its way to the tranquil shores of Costa del Silencio.
about.paragraph2: Raised among the rich traditions of Nepali cuisine, we learned that food is more than ingredientsâ€”it's a connection to land, family, and heritage. From open-fire sekuwa to the comforting warmth of goat curry, every meal was a celebration of life's simplest joys.
about.paragraph3: With time, our path led us across continents. Carrying our flavors, our stories, and our dreams, we arrived in Tenerife with one goal: to share the essence of Nepal with a new home.
about.paragraph4: Himalayan Curry & Tandoori House is the result of that journeyâ€”a humble space where bold Himalayan spices meet the breeze of the Atlantic. Every dish is prepared with care, tradition, and the hope that you'll taste not just the food, but the journey behind it.
about.quote: This is more than a restaurant. It's a story served on a plate.

galleryComingSoon.description: We're preparing beautiful photos of our authentic cuisine and restaurant ambiance.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Visit us for an authentic Himalayan dining experience or get in touch for reservations and inquiries.

findUs.title: Find Us in Costa del Silencio
findUs.description: Located in the heart of Costa del Silencio, our restaurant offers easy access and a welcoming atmosphere. We're just steps away from the beautiful coastline, perfect for a meal after exploring the area.

chefRecommendations.title: Chef's Recommendations
chefRecommendations.subtitle: Discover our most beloved dishes, carefully curated by our head chef to showcase the finest flavors from the Himalayas and India

cta.title: Can't decide? Let our chef surprise you!
cta.description: Ask your server about our daily chef's special or let us create a custom menu featuring the best of both Nepali and Indian cuisines

essenceOfHimalayan.name: Essence of Himalayan Set Menu
essenceOfHimalayan.description: A traditional 4-course journey through authentic Nepali flavors. Experience Mo:Mo, Thukpa, Thakali curry, and Yomari dessert.
essenceOfHimalayan.chefNote: Our signature dining experience showcasing the authentic taste of the Himalayas

butterChicken.name: Butter Chicken
butterChicken.description: Chicken pieces in a creamy sauce with extra butter, almond & a touch of garlic & fenugreek.
butterChicken.chefNote: Rich, creamy, and perfectly spiced - a crowd favorite

tandooriMixGrill.name: Tandoori Mix Grill
tandooriMixGrill.description: Mix of lamb tikka, sheekh kebab, chicken tikka & king prawns served on a sizzling hot plate.
tandooriMixGrill.chefNote: Perfect for sharing and experiencing multiple tandoori flavors

specialHimalayanBiryani.name: Special Himalayan Biryani
specialHimalayanBiryani.description: Our signature biryani with unique spice blend. Fragrant basmati rice with authentic Himalayan spices.
specialHimalayanBiryani.chefNote: A unique blend of Nepali and Indian flavors in every grain

hero.title: Authentic Flavors from the Himalayas
hero.subtitle: Experience the rich culinary traditions of Nepal and India, crafted with time-honored recipes and the finest spices from the mountain regions.

moMo.name: Mo: Mo - VEGAN ðŸŒ±
moMo.description: Textured soy, cabbage, and Himalayan spices

vegSpringRolls.name: Vegetable Spring Rolls
vegSpringRolls.description: Crispy rolls filled with fresh vegetables and served with sweet chili sauce

barraKebab.name: Barra Kebab
barraKebab.description: Boneless chicken marinated in yogurt & spices, flame-grilled for a smoky bite

tandooriPrawns.name: Tandoori King Prawns
tandooriPrawns.description: Jumbo prawns marinated in yogurt, garlic, and tandoori spices, cooked in the clay oven

specialHimalayan.name: Special Himalayan
specialHimalayan.description: Our signature curry with a special blend of spices, made with chicken, lamb & King prawn

lambVindaloo.name: Lamb Vindaloo
lambVindaloo.description: Spicy Goan-style curry with tender lamb pieces, potatoes, and a vinegar-based sauce

vegetableBiryani.name: Vegetable Biryani
vegetableBiryani.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with mixed vegetables, saffron, and aromatic spices

garlicNaan.name: Garlic Naan
garlicNaan.description: Traditional leavened bread baked in the tandoor with fresh garlic and coriander

mangoLassi.name: Mango Lassi
mangoLassi.description: Refreshing yogurt-based drink with sweet mango puree

masalaChai.name: Masala Chai
masalaChai.description: Traditional Indian spiced tea with milk and aromatic spices

newWelcome.title: Himalayan
newWelcome.subtitle: Curry & Tandoor House
newWelcome.welcomeText1: Welcome to Himalayan Curry & Tandoor House, where the rich flavors of the Himalayas come to life. Experience authentic Nepali and Indian dishes crafted with traditional recipes and fresh ingredients.
newWelcome.welcomeText2: Discover the bold, fresh flavors of Nepalâ€”a hidden gem of the Himalayasâ€”paired with the familiar comfort of Indian cuisine.
